mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT owner.id, owner.first_name as firstName, owner.last_name as lastName, owner.address, owner.city, owner.telephone FROM Owners owner left join pets on owner.id = pets.owner_id WHERE owner.last_name LIKE #{lastName} || '%'

SELECT owner.id, owner.first_name as firstName, owner.last_name as lastName, owner.address, owner.city, owner.telephone FROM Owners owner left join pets on owner.id = pets.owner_id WHERE owner.id = #{id}
